title: Kurnool Medical College: Admission 2024, Courses, Fees, Cutoff, scholarships, Facilities
meta_description: Kurnool Medical College (KMC), Kurnool, was established in 1956 under the guidance of Sri T.T. Krishnamachari (Then Finance Minister of India). Kurnool Medical College offers admission in various courses in the medical field, such as MBBS, MD/MS and DM/M.Ch.
keywords: Kurnool Medical College, Kurnool Medical College Admission Dates, Kurnool Medical College Courses, Kurnool Medical College Fees, Kurnool Medical College Faculty, Kurnool Medical College application, Kurnool Medical College Departments , Kurnool Medical College facilities,Kurnool Medical College FAQs

basic_info.name: Kurnool Medical College Courses and Fees 2024
description: Kurnool Medical College offers three courses to its students, namely MBBS, MD/MS and DM/M.Ch. The duration of the MBBS course is 5 years, and the duration of the MD/MS and DM/M.Ch courses is three years. The table below provides a detailed overview of Kurnool Medical College Courses and Fees 2024.

basic_info.name: Kurnool Medical College Admission 2024
description: Kurnool Medical College Admission 2024 is based on the score obtained in NEET UG, NEET PG and NEET SS. Students who have cleared the NEET UG, NEET PG, and NEET SS cut-off must register for Andhra Pradesh State-level counselling. Andhra Pradesh State Level counselling is conducted by Dr YSR University of Health Sciences. Before starting the online registration process, candidates are advised to keep all the documents, valid email IDs, and mobile numbers handy.

basic_info.name: Kurnool Medical College Scholarship
description: Kurnool Medical College provides scholarships to the economically weaker candidates and the meritorious candidates. Candidates need to apply for the Kurnool Medical College Scholarship during the commencement of the academic year.

However, proper documents in support of financial status are required to be submitted. Documents must be authenticated by the competent authority. There is a committee formed by the Governing Body, with students, non-teaching office staff, and teaching staff as members to look into the process of selection and distribution of the available fund.

faqs.question: Is Kurnool Medical Council approved by Medical Council of India?
faqs.answer: AnsKurnool Medical College is approved by Medical Council of India.

faqs.question: What are the courses offered at Kurnool Medical College?
faqs.answer: AnsThe courses offered at Kurnool Medical College are MBBS,MD/Ms and DM/M.Ch.

faqs.question: What is the seat intake capacity of the Kurnool Medical College for MD in General Medicine?
faqs.answer: AnsThe total intake capacity of the Kurnool Medical College in the MD in Medicine courses is 20 each year.

faqs.question: What are the facilities provided at Kurnool Medical College?
faqs.answer: AnsThe facilities provided at Kurnool Medical College are hostel, library, canteen, sports ground and laboratory.

faqs.question: Does Kurnool Medical College provide scholarships to students?
faqs.answer: AnsKurnool Medical College provides scholarships to the economically weaker candidates and the meritorious candidates. Candidates need to apply for the Kurnool Medical College Scholarship during the commencement of the academic year.

faqs.question: Ques What are the departments present at Kurnool Medical College?
faqs.answer: AnsThe departments present at Kurnool Medical College areKurnool Medical College DepartmentsBiochemistryRadiodiagnosisDermato-Venero-LeprologyPsychiatryOphthalmologyOto-rhino-laryngologyForensic MedicineRespiratory MedicinePharmacologyPhysiologyPediatric MedicineOrthopedicsObstetrics & GynecologyAnesthesiologyMicrobiology

faqs.question: Does Kurnool Medical college provides placement facility to its students?
faqs.answer: AnsKurnool Medical College does not provide placement opportunities to its students.

faqs.question: What is the total intake capacity of the college in the MBBS program?
faqs.answer: AnsThe total intake capacity of the Kurnool Medical College in the Doctor in Medicine courses is 250 each year.

faqs.question: When can the candidates apply for admission to the college?
faqs.answer: AnsCandidates seeking admission in the Kurnool Medical college can apply aftter declaration of NEET UG/NEET PG/NEET SS results to apply for the state level counselling.

faqs.question: What is the admission process for MD course at Kurnool Medical College?
faqs.answer: For admission at MD course at Kurnool MEdical College an individual needs to clear NEET PG.

faqs.question: How is the faculty of the Kurnool Medical College?
faqs.answer: AnsAt present, Dr. G.S. Rama Prasad is the Principal of the College. The college has a large team of senior faculty members, guest lecturers, assistant professors, associate professors and administrative members. In total, there are more than 200s of teaching faculties with all of them as experts in their specialization.

faqs.question: What is the admission process for MBBS course at Kurnool Medical College?
faqs.answer: AnsFor admission at MBBS course at Kurnool Medical College an individual needs to clear NEET UG.

Section.name: About KMC
Section.description:
Kurnool Medical College (KMC), Kurnool, was established in 1956 under the guidance of Sri T.T. Krishnamachari (Then Finance Minister of India). Kurnool Medical College was affiliated with Sri Venkateswara University and was approved by the Government of Andhra Pradesh and Medical Council of India (MCI).
Kurnool Medical College is equipped with the latest technological equipment and gadgets along with the facility of a hostel, canteen, laboratory, library and sports ground. The college organises many seminars, functions and competitions like World Heart Day and Gandhi Jayanti in the auditorium to keep the students active on social platforms as well.
Table of Content
